meanings.definition: Reaching or extending to a great height.
meanings.sent1: The skyscraping tree in our backyard provides shade all day.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraping mountain peak was covered in snow.
meanings.sent3: The skyscraping giraffe tried to hide behind a short bush.
meanings.sent4: Her skyscraping ambition propelled her to success.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraping roller coaster made my heart race with excitement.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a very tall building.
meanings.sent1: The city skyline was filled with skyscraping structures.
meanings.sent2: We visited a skyscraping tower in the bustling city.
meanings.sent3: The tiny mouse felt lost in the skyscraping office building.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were as skyscraping as the tallest building in town.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraping glass windows reflected the sunlight beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The skyscraping basketball player easily dunked the ball.
meanings.sent2: The skyscraping waves crashed against the shore during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The skyscraping ladder reached the top shelf in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her skyscraping heels made her tower over everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraping redwoods in the forest seemed to touch the sky.
